snippet: Rick Santorum has won the nonbinding Missouri primary, giving his candidacy a boost after a long stretch in which he trailed his rivals even as he claimed to be the real conservative in the race.
abstract: Rick Santorum has won the nonbinding Missouri primary, giving his candidacy a boost after a long stretch in which he trailed his rivals even as he claimed to be the real conservative in the race.
lead_paragraph: Rick Santorum has won the Missouri primary, giving his candidacy a boost after a long stretch in which he trailed his rivals even as he claimed to be the real conservative in the race.
